meanings.definition: A place or facility where cars are washed.
meanings.sent1: I always take my car to the carwashes to keep it clean.
meanings.sent2: The carwashes on Main Street are always busy on weekends.
meanings.sent3: Why did the carwashes throw a party? Because they wanted to make a splash!
meanings.sent4: The carwashes stood like giant hands ready to scrub the cars clean.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the carwashes beckoned drivers in for a sparkling clean.

meanings.definition: The act of washing a car.
meanings.sent1: Car owners enjoy doing carwashes to keep their vehicles shiny.
meanings.sent2: After a long road trip, the carwashes were necessary to remove all the dirt.
meanings.sent3: The carwashes decided to have a race to see who could wash the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous carwashes were like a soothing ritual for her.
meanings.sent5: The carwashes in the driveway glistened under the sun, waiting for their turn.
